content: this legal text explains a court ruling regarding the division of community property between two parties the court dissolved the community property and assigned specific portions to each party the defendant was ordered to pay compensation for damages and the plaintiff was awarded a sum for the use of the property the defendant argued that the mezzanine floor consisted of two independent units but the court disagreed after the plaintiffs death their heirs joined the case and insisted on their claim eventually the parties reached a settlement agreement but due to a default by one party a judgment was necessary to finalize the division of the property a courtappointed consultant estimated the propertys value and the court assigned specific portions to each party based on the consultants report the parties requested the division to be carried out according to the division project and the court justified the compensation of court costs the court made a final ruling dissolving the community property and assigning specific portions to the heirs involved the court also compensated for the costs of the case which will be split equally between the parties the ruling was made in santa maria capua vetere on may 22 2018 and filed in the clerks office on june 13 2018
